Dialogue.Page: This platform showcases the winners of the modding community’s third mod jam, held in March of 2024 with the theme of “Community”.
This jam had a special restriction confining each submission to only one planet. All Jam 3 mods orbit around the same star in the Jam 3 system.
With this new restriction, players can go from one mod to the next without leaving the system, enhancing the experience for both modders and players alike.
If you want to, you can meet the creators of these mods at the party on the north pole!
